Package Camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
Camp.Camp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Camp extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a camp with its information, attendees, committees, and feedback.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(String campName, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate regClosingDate, String campUserGroup, CampVisibility campVisibility, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlot, String description, String staffInChargeID)
      Constructor to initialize a Camp object with camp information.
      Parameters:
      campName - Name of the camp.
      startDate - Start date of the camp.
      endDate - End date of the camp.
      regClosingDate - Closing date for camp registration.
      campUserGroup - User group associated with the camp.
      campVisibility - Visibility status of the camp.
      location - Location of the camp.
      totalSlots - Total slots available for the camp.
      campCommitteeSlot - Slots allocated for the camp committee.
      description - Description of the camp.
      staffInChargeID - ID of the staff in charge of the camp.

    • findCampCommittee

      public CampCommittee findCampCommittee(String studentID)
      Finds a CampCommittee based on the student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student to search for in the camp committees.
      Returns:
      The CampCommittee object if found; otherwise, returns null.
